# 🏠 HOME App - CI/CD Status

## GitHub Actions Pipeline

### 📊 Current Status
- **Repository:** marianahernandez1510202/home-reservas-app
- **Branch:** main
- **Last Run:** Success ✅

### 🔗 Quick Links
- [View Workflows](https://github.com/marianahernandez1510202/home-reservas-app/actions)

---

## 🧪 Test Results

### Backend Tests
- Status: ✅ **PASSING**
- Duration: ~30s

### Frontend Tests  
- Status: ✅ **PASSING**
- Duration: ~35s

### K6 Load Tests
- Status: ✅ **PASSING**
- Duration: 121s

# 🚀 K6 Load Testing Results

## Last Execution

### 📈 Performance Metrics

| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| **Max Virtual Users** | 50 VUs |
| **Total HTTP Requests** | 1,314 |
| **Average Response Time** | 3 ms |
| **P95 Response Time** | 5 ms |
| **Success Rate** | 100% ✅ |
| **Test Duration** | 121 seconds |

### 🎯 Endpoints Tested

1. **GET /api/properties** - ✅ All successful
2. **GET /api/properties/:id** - ✅ All successful

### 📊 Load Pattern

- **Ramp-up:** 5 → 50 VUs (20s)
- **Sustained:** 50 VUs (40s)
- **Peak:** 50 VUs (20s)
- **Ramp-down:** 50 → 0 VUs (20s)

# ⚙️ CI/CD Configuration

## 🔧 Technologies Used

- **CI/CD Platform:** GitHub Actions
- **Load Testing:** K6
- **Monitoring:** Grafana Cloud
- **Backend:** Node.js + Express + MongoDB
- **Frontend:** React

## 📝 Workflow Jobs

1. **Backend Tests** - Unit and integration tests for API
2. **Frontend Tests** - Component and UI tests  
3. **K6 Load Tests** - Performance and load testing

## 🎯 Grafana Integration

- Service Account configured ✅
- API Tokens generated ✅
- Logs endpoint configured ✅
- Metrics endpoint configured ✅
